scripts.lint:claude: git diff main | claude -p 'you are a linter. please review the following code changes for typos. report the filename and line number on one line, and a description of the issue on the second line. do not return any other text.'
scripts.lint:claude2file: git diff main | claude -p 'you are a linter. please review the following code changes for typos. report the filename and line number on one line, and a description of the issue on the second line. do not return any other text.' > claude-lint-report.txt
